name: The Explosive Story of Bombot
description:
"GO BOOM BOOM BOMBOT!"

The Explosive Story of Bombot  is a platformer where you play Bombot the robot (or do you?). 

Use your environment to control your character who has become out of control due to a computer virus.

Will you stop it from exploding?

Created for the GMTK2020 (July 11th- July 12th)

Theme: Out of Control

Created entirely by : Tristan ZendSeeker (Development, Sound & Art)
